channel.title: How in the world am I terrible at future bass
channel.description: I heard some recent posts by A L E X, and I realized I struggle making future bass!... Especially the chords! :( I don’t struggle with making the chords themselves, but I can’t make the synths sound good Blending usually sucks for me so anyone who has made future bass like him, please give tips on how to make god like future bass

item.title: How in the world am I terrible at future bass
item.dc:creator: Mr_Mooo
item.description:
you don’t need to compare your music to other people’s, if you are struggling to make it sound like their music then invent your own kind of future bass music

item.source: How in the world am I terrible at future bass

item.title: How in the world am I terrible at future bass
item.dc:creator: INDIR3CT
item.description:
I really don’t think you are bad at future bass haha
Was looking through some of your older tracks, absolutley amazing! You really are very talented at making future/ kawaii bass tracks. Like this - > https://soundcloud.com/blue_jy/akiba
Try focusing on making your own unique style, and make sure not to compare yourself to others You are great at future bass, keep it up!

Read full topic

item.title: How in the world am I terrible at future bass
item.dc:creator: Blue-Jy
item.description:
I heard some recent posts by A L E X, and I realized I struggle making future bass!..
Especially the chords!
I don’t struggle with making the chords themselves, but I can’t make the synths sound good
Blending usually sucks for me so anyone who has made future bass like him, please give tips on how to make god like future bass
